name: Somewhere [Adagio]
content: The more that we know give you
The less we know they'll try
Why your dreams still burn oh yeah
Do you know why you wake at night
When you should fight oh oh
Do you know what you really love
The more that we know give you
The less we know they'll try
Beyond this one of us will
Somewhere where the sky goes on
There's so many things you love
Do you know what your limits are
The more that we in you
Know the less we know they'll try
Beyond this one of us will
Somewhere where the sky goes on
There's so many things you love
Beyond this one of us will
Somewhere where the sky goes on
There's and you can't give up
